F7 - F9 to Music Controls (daskeyboard only) F7 to Music Prev F8 to Music Play/Pause F9 to Music Next private.musiccontrols DeviceVendor::DAS, DeviceProduct::DAS_KEYBOARD​ __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F7, ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_PREV __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F8, ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_PLAY __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F9, ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_NEXT
